popular.title: Rasmalai
popular.text: The all-time favourite sweet of all. Rich, creamy and so scrumptious that one is simply just not enough. Made of cheese dumplings soaked with fragrant and flavoured thick sweet milk, just a bite creates a riot of flavor in your mouth.

popular.title: Angoori Rasmalai
popular.text: Soft Mini Cheese Dumplings soaked in rich flavoured thickened milk that would take you straight to the corner sweet shops of India, to remember the moments you waited and patiently saved to relish these delicious bites.

popular.title: Gulab Jamun
popular.text: A sweet which remains the favourite of all generations, which truly lives to the term ‘age no bar’, the most loved and most sought-after Gulab Jamun. Made of flour and milk powder, fried to perfect texture.

popular.title: Mini Gulab Jamun
popular.text: Sweet little fulfilling mini gulab jamun bites for a quick non-stop eat. Why stop with one when these delectable pops are just an order away. Your favourites made out of flour and milk powder fried to the perfect golden brown.

popular.title: Motichoor Ladoo
popular.text: There are hardly any celebrations without this one. You can never see it alone, but piled up to create a beautiful pyramid, all eyes upon it even from a distance, like a decorative art on the serving table.

popular.title: Kaju Katli
popular.text: If royalty were to be named in the world of sweets, Kaju Katli would be crowed without a second thought. Made out of beautiful and rich blend of cashews and sugar, these are first spread on a platter and then cut into very geometrical diamond delicacy which we assure, will never disappoint.

popular.title: Pista Barfi
popular.text: Our Pista Barfi is a luxurious blend of creamy sweetness and the rich, nutty flavor of premium pistachios. Each piece is crafted to perfection, offering a delightful texture and an irresistible taste that's sure to satisfy.

popular.title: Rasgulla
popular.text: Words would fail to describe these ever juicy, scrumptious and tender rasgulla, which literally  means ‘ras’-Juice ‘gulla’-ball. Made of ‘channa’ or cottage sweet, these are then soaked in aromatic flavoured sugar syrup.

popular.title: Plain Barfi
popular.text: Our Plain Barfi is a timeless treat, crafted from the finest ingredients to deliver a smooth, melt-in-your-mouth texture. Rich in flavor yet subtly sweet, it's the perfect choice for those who appreciate classic Indian confectionery.

popular.title: Assorted Barfis
popular.text: Indulge in the rich and vibrant flavors of our Assorted Barfis, a perfect blend of tradition and taste. Crafted in the heart of the UK using the finest ingredients, each piece is a celebration of classic Indian sweets.

popular.title: DATES BARFI
popular.text: Experience the natural sweetness of our Dates Barfi, a luxurious treat crafted with care in the UK. Made with the finest dates, this barfi is a perfect fusion of health and indulgence.

popular.title: Milk Cake
popular.text: At Meltz India, we bring you the timeless charm of traditional sweets with our exquisite Milk Cake. Rich, creamy, and perfectly caramelized, this delicacy is handcrafted with love, using pure milk and the finest ingredients.

popular.title: Kalakand
popular.text: At Meltz India, we bring you the authentic flavor of Indian sweets with our delectable Kalakand. Made from pure, fresh milk and slow-cooked to perfection, our Kalakand is a celebration of rich texture and unparalleled taste.
